body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Russell Roberts and the customer's name is Jessica Griffin.  The conversation is about Strolid Motors (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling BrightConnect Internet Services. My name is Jessica. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Jessica, I’m having some issues with my internet connection.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. May I have your name to look up your account information, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Alex. Could you please provide me with your service address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It’s one two three Elm Street, Apartment four B.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. And can I also have the phone number associated with your account?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it’s five five five, three two one, eight nine seven zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Alex. I have all the information I need. I'll quickly check your account and run some diagnostics. This will only take a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can see there's an outage in your area affecting multiple customers. Our team is working on it, and the service should be restored within the next two hours.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Alex. Thank you for your patience and for calling BrightConnect Internet Services. Have a great day!
